result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony Alexander Campillo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Apply bond on file.
DNA surcharge.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony Alexander Campillo

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Scobey. ADA:  Michael E. Nieskes   DF ATTY:  Joel Kenneth Larimore   DF:  Anthony Alexander Campillo appeared. Set for status. Includes status in 13CF124,  and arraignment in 14CF165, and 14CF333. Cases called at 10:44 a.m. ADA Nieskes informs Crt of agreement. Victims rights have been complied with.  State does not object to expungement pending DE has no consumption offenses within the next 18 months.  DE pleads guilty to Amended Ct 1 - Misdemeanor Battery 940.19(1) in 13CF124. DE pleads guilty to Amended Misdemeanor Bail Jumping in 14CF165. DE sworn. Crt informs DE of rights. Attorneys stipulate to the facts. Crt takes judicial notice of the bond. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily, and knowingly makes plea. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis, and finds DE guilty of Amended Ct 1 in 13CF124 and guilty of Misdemeanor Bail Jumping in 14CF165. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 2 in 14CF124 and dismisses 14CF333. Recommendations. DE makes statement. Crt orders:  

-15 days jail. Credit for time served.
-Restitution $1014.73.  Apply bond monies.
-Letter of apology to Mr. Montpetit.
-Court costs on each count.  DNA surcharge to be added to 14CF165. Apply bond monies and any remaining payable through a payment plan.

DE to meet with payment clerk today. Crt will consider expungment after 18 months, pending DE gets HSED, does not commit any crimes/offenses and sumbmits letter of apology.
